com.google.enterprise.connector.util

Class IOExceptionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.enterprise.connector.util.IOExceptionHelper
  • Deprecated. 
    Use IOException.IOException(String, Throwable)

    @Deprecated
public class IOExceptionHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Compatibility utility for creating an IOException with a cause. This was needed because in Java 5 IOException does not provide a constructor that takes a cause parameter.
    Since:
    2.8

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.io.IOException newIOException(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Deprecated. 
      Use IOException.IOException(String, Throwable)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • newIOException

        @Deprecated
public static java.io.IOException newIOException(java.lang.String message,
                                                             java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Deprecated. Use IOException.IOException(String, Throwable)
        Makes a new IOException with the supplied message and cause in a manner that was supported by Java 5.
        Parameters:
        message - the message
        cause - root failure cause
